text: tame ketalaka lokone eva pana joso je'oni iccha che ke tamari sathe pana santithi rahe ane potana loko sathe pana santithi rahe, (parantu) jyare pana phitnani taka male to undha tha'i temam padi jaya che, basa! Jo a loko tamarathi alaga na rahe ane tamari sathe santini vata na kare ane potana hathane na roke to te'one pakado ane mari nakho, jyam pana ju'o. A ja te loko che jemana para ame tamane khullo adhikara apyo che
